Package com.github.tommyettinger.voxparser

Class Tools3D

java.lang.Object
com.github.tommyettinger.voxparser.Tools3D
public class Tools3D extends Object
Miscellaneous code for working with 3D byte arrays. Includes some code that is used throughout the rest of the library.

    • runCA

      public static byte[][][] runCA(byte[][][] voxels, int smoothLevel)
      Runs a 3D cellular automaton on the given voxel grid in an attempt to "grind down" any oddly-shaped, small cruft that sticks out from the main model. Higher smoothLevel values make this run longer and smooth more aggressively. If smoothLevel is 0 or less, this returns voxels without changes.
      Parameters:
      voxels - a 3D byte array representing a palette index per byte
      smoothLevel - if greater than 0, this will remove "cruft;" higher values are more aggressive
      Returns:
      if any changes were made, a copy of voxels that has been smoothed

    • randomizePoint

      public static float randomizePoint(long x, long y, long z, long s)
      Returns a hashed float value given four longs; the result should be uniform between 0 (inclusive) and 1 (exclusive).
      Parameters:
      x - position as a long
      y - position as a long
      z - position as a long
      s - state or frame as a long
      Returns:
      a uniform float between 0.0f (inclusive) and 1.0f (exclusive)

    • randomizePointRare

      public static float randomizePointRare(long x, long y, long z, long s)
      Returns a hashed float value given four longs; the result is between 0 and 1.5 but is more often low.
      Parameters:
      x - position as a long
      y - position as a long
      z - position as a long
      s - state or frame as a long
      Returns:
      a float between 0.0f (inclusive) and 1.5f (exclusive), more often low than high
